description: Officials in Texas have offered President-elect Trump a 1,400-acre ranch for his mass deportation plan. The Texas General Land Office Land Commissioner Dawn Buckingham said in a letter to Trump Tuesday that her office was “fully prepared” to work with federal agencies that are going to be involved in Trump’s immigration plan, and specifically deportation....
title: Texas offers Trump 1,400-acre ranch for mass deportation plan

description: A powerful storm, carrying high winds, rain and snow, left just under 300,000 people without power in Washington state late Wednesday.  The major storm, which is considered a “bomb cyclone,” hit western Washington on Tuesday and Wednesday, causing more than 294,000 state residents to lose power, according to the latest number on poweroutage.us, a tracking...
title: Storm leaves 300,000 people without power in Washington state

description: The Senate voted overwhelmingly Wednesday to reject a resolution sponsored by Sen. Bernie Sanders (I-Vt.) to block the sale of certain offensive weapons to Israel in protest of its ongoing military operations in Gaza. The Senate voted 18 to 79 to defeat S.J. Res. 111, which would have blocked the sale of 120-millimeter tank rounds....
title: Senate rejects Sanders-backed proposal to block arms sales to Israel

description: A Florida man was arrested on Wednesday over an alleged plot to bomb the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) to “reset” the U.S. government, according to unsealed documents.  Harun Abdul-Malik Yener, a South Florida resident, was charged with attempting to use an improvised explosive device to damage or destroy a “building used in interstate or...
title: Florida man arrested over plot to bomb NYSE to 'reset' US government

description: Rep. Anna Paulina Luna (R-Fla.) called Speaker Johnson (R-La.) “anti-family” over her efforts to allow congresswomen to vote by proxy after giving birth. In a post thread on X, Luna explained Wednesday where her proposal stands. She said she has spoken with Johnson for months about the bipartisan effort to allow mothers to vote while...
title: Rep. Luna calls Speaker Johnson 'anti-family' over proxy voting
